column2: Should we get started with the code from Lightspeed?

Remember, one of the codes to remove the shield of the AI trap is in deep inside Lightspeed.

We'll need to create a level with every enemy and powerup in the game. Let's launch Lightspeed.
Click on the Lightspeed icon on the desktop.

We're going to make some power ups! Powerups are capsules that bring benefits when the player's ship picks them up.

Let's go to the coding panel.

Click on the Spawn tab. See that `spawnPowerup()` function? That's what creates powerups.

It returns a number with the type of powerup. 0 means no powerup. Change it to a 1 and try the level.
Let's see if the powerups appear...
I estimate there are have been ZERO powerups spawned. Something is wrong. Let's go back and check.
Excellent. The powerups are there, although they don't do anything let. Finish the level now.
Great. Your Lightspeed skills are still quite sharp. Come back later and let's keep working on that powerup.
